name: Nightmare Containment
description:
You are a scientist in a top secret lab that is producing magical mystery chemicals. The secret is they are created from a creature who could destroy humanity. It’s been safely contained and docile, until now. It started to gain strength and has broken the containment. It’s still somewhat docile but if you don’t regularly harvest the chemicals, it will gain its strength and break free. Keep the creature docile, while repairing the containment and also upkeeping regular operations in the lab.

Objective
  • Harvest Creature’s Chemicals
    • The creature will grow over time. Harvest slows down growth
    • Harvested chemicals must be brought to storage, they can not be set down
    • Fixed conveyors make storage easier
  • Repair the lab’s equipment
    • Bring the right equipment to the Phone, Conveyors, Storage, and Containment to fix them
  • Keep operations running
    • Fix the Phone and have your storage picked up regularly
Controls
  • WASD / Arrows - Move
  • E - Interact (pickup, drop)
Known Issues
  • Lighting is incredibly laggy in WebGL and has been disabled. Recommended to use Windows/Mac/Linux version for best experience
